data.title: Hercule Poirot
data.meta_description: Hercule Poirot is a fictional Belgian detective created by British writer Agatha Christie. Poirot is one of Christie's most famous and long-running characters, appearing in 33 novels, two plays, and 51 short stories published between 1920 and 1975.
data.text:
Fictional detective character created by Agatha Christie / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
